name: @danielkalen/notices-engine
description: A simple notice and subnotice display system
author: danielkalen

scripts.postversion: echo \'$(json -f package.json version)\' > .version.coffee && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run minify
scripts.compile: npm run compile:notices && npm run compile:subnotices
scripts.minify: closure-service dist/js/notices.js > dist/js/notices.min.js && closure-service dist/js/subnotices.js > dist/js/subnotices.min.js
